messages.title: TACKLE CRIME AND ANTISOCIAL BEHAVIOUR
messages.content: I will work with authorities and local residents to reduce crime and anti-social behaviour. I support residents' calls for more CCTV. I'll ensure that we see extra police officers on the beat in our area.

messages.title: SUPPORT LOCAL BUSINESS
messages.content: Supporting our local businesses and traders by cutting business rates. I will lobby government for funds to invest in our markets. Small and medium sized businesses are a big part of our community and I will ensure they continue to thrive.

messages.title: CUT POLLUTION
messages.content: Driving forward a positive environmental agenda. I'll address air pollution across our borough, introduce more electric charging points for cars and plant more trees in open spaces.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work with authorities and local residents to reduce crime and anti-social behaviour, support residents' calls for more CCTV, and ensure extra police officers in the area.
Cut business rates for local businesses and traders, lobby for government funds to invest in markets, and support the thriving of small and medium sized businesses.
Address air pollution, introduce electric charging points for cars, and plant more trees in open spaces.

issues.environment: Driving forward a positive environmental agenda. I'll address air pollution across our borough, introduce more electric charging points for cars and plant more trees in open spaces.
